data.name: Real Orchestra
data.detailed_description:
"A gaming experience for aspiring conductors."
Real Orchestra is a life-like experience as a orchestra conductor.
Become a conductor for a symphony orchestra and conduct the famous classical tunes.
Use your hand to hit the notes as they fly at you.
Master the pace of the music in practice mode.
The music changes in pace and volume in accordance with your directions.
data.about_the_game:
"A gaming experience for aspiring conductors."
Real Orchestra is a life-like experience as a orchestra conductor.
Become a conductor for a symphony orchestra and conduct the famous classical tunes.
Use your hand to hit the notes as they fly at you.
Master the pace of the music in practice mode.
The music changes in pace and volume in accordance with your directions.
data.short_description: Real Orchestra is a VR experience as a orchestra conductor. Become a conductor and direct your orchestra.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD R9 290
  • Storage: 650 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7-4790 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek
